name: Museum of the Saved Image
description:
This is a gallery that I created to house the images that i had on my desktop last year. I needed to get rid of the clutter, but there was something about the images as a collection that i wanted to preserve before they were scattered again to the digital winds. 

I made a majority of this 1 year ago, put it away, and took it back out recently to wrap it up.

While it's definitely personal, I hope that something can reach through without any more context than what's given

takes about 20~ minutes to walk through the museum, longer if you're spending more time with the images

thank you~
